title: FanAaaaart!
content:
Yes! I made some fanart to practice drawing my Keens.

[url=http://www.deviantart.com/view/29509824/]www.deviantart.com/view/29509824/[/url]
[url=http://www.deviantart.com/view/29509943/]www.deviantart.com/view/29509943/[/url]
(Note: these post were updated with better fanart than before, the previous art sucked. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img] )

After these drawings, I will continue practicing so you'll get to see some top-notch pictures for the game I'm making! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: FanAaaaart!
content:
Cool, I like more the first picture. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Keep on drawing.. Never too much KeenArt!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: FanAaaaart!
content:
Thanks.

Uh, I just noticed I forgot the damage on the helmet in the second, but whatever. Just keep on practicing... :P___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: FanAaaaart!
content:

"Gue!! I Love It! I Love It!" - Rosco P. Coltrane

title: Re: FanAaaaart!
content: They're actually pretty terrible, but we appreciate the effort. Keep practicing. Keen's hand is backwards in the second picture.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Re: FanAaaaart!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Not bad. Not bad at all...[hr][/quote]
Actually... they are. :/

I don't want to be mean but there is definitely some room for improvement. I know when I first joined here I sucked (and still do... I just suck a little less.) but I just kept at it and learned a lot of things. Not just on my fan art but on all my drawings in general.

What I am saying is, don't get too discouraged, keep trying to make your stuff better. I am sure we all appreciate the effort. I know I do. Finally someone else made something! Come on people! It doesn't take much!
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] -----------------------
[url=http://Galaxie.Spatang.com][img]http://img360.imageshack.us/img360/548/blegdandsmeegnewbanner2wf.png[/img][/url]
